description:
As a company with over 30 years in the market, Rideau has had time to experiment with many different styles of blinds and adapt its catalog to what our customers need. The result of this process has been three carefully picked, larger categories: interior, exterior, and executive and inside each one there is a wide variety of styles which will match any type of solar protection neccessity your house or company may have.
Each one of the items you see in our catalog is available everyday throughout the year, so there is never artificial pressure to buy now. You will know when you need Rideau, and when you do, we will be there for you.
